wikipedia_page.main: Frank Albert Antony Wootton OBE PPGAvA (30 July 1911 – 21 April 1998) was an aviation artist, famous for his works depicting the Royal Air Force during the Second World War.

response: * Frank Wootton, famous aviation artist, was born in the village.
*Frank Wootton (artist) (1911–1998), British war artist famous for his work with the Royal Air Force
*Frank Wootton (jockey) (1893–1940), Australian, multiple British flat racing Champion Jockey
*Frank Wootton, 86, British aviation artist.Obituary: Frank Wootton
